sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<g:evaluate var="laser_wav" object="true">
   var gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_asteroids_game_files");
   gr.get("bff89f1cdbbb9b003db2dfea5e96193a");
   laser_wav = gr.file_content;
</g:evaluate>

<g:evaluate var="explosion_wav" object="true">
   var gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_asteroids_game_files");
   gr.get("480527d0dbfb9b003db2dfea5e961955");
   explosion_wav = gr.file_content;
</g:evaluate>

<g:no_escape>
<script type="text/javascript">
var laser_wav = new Audio("data:audio/wav;base64," + "${laser_wav}");
var explosion_wav = new Audio("data:audio/wav;base64," + "${explosion_wav}");
explosion_wav.play();
</script>
</g:no_escape>

</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: test
